faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about LexiCraft ‚Ä¢ Â≠óÂ°äÊâÄ

teaching.question: Do you teach English?
teaching.answer: No, we don't teach English. We are a verification platform, not a teaching platform. Children learn elsewhere (school, cram school), we verify if they recognize foundation elements.

different.question: How are you different from teaching apps?
different.answer: Teaching apps teach, we verify results. We provide objective third-party verification, verifying if your education investment actually worked.

verify.question: What do you verify?
verify.answer: We verify if children recognize foundation elements (words, phrases, idioms). We verify recognition ability, not deep understanding (that's our future goal). Recognition is the foundation of understanding.

scholarship.question: How does the Block Trust work?
scholarship.answer: Parents purchase a Block Trust Package (NT$500-1,000). Money stays in escrow, locked in blocks. Kids unlock blocks through validation quizzes. Once unlocked, funds are released to the child's account. Parents can withdraw anytime. Meet validation standards, 100% of trust funds unlocked.

mining.question: What is Brain Mining?
mining.answer: Brain Mining is our gamified validation system. Kids see locked blocks (gray), each with a value. They use validation quizzes (the pickaxe) to unlock blocks. Correct answers = critical hits. Unlocked blocks turn gold and cash is deposited. It's not forced study, it's legal mining.

trust.question: How is this different from regular tuition?
trust.answer: Regular tuition: You pay, money is gone, hope they learned. Block Trust: You invest, money stays in escrow, they unlock it through proof of learning. It transforms education spending from consumption into asset transfer. Your money isn't spent until they prove recognition.

scam.question: Isn't this a scam?
scam.answer: No. We are an educational verification platform, not a cash flow verification platform. Your money is in platform escrow account, unlocks after child verification. Business model is completely transparent, withdrawable anytime.

withdraw.question: Can money really be withdrawn anytime?
withdraw.answer: Yes. Zero handling fees, arrives within 1 day after linking bank account. This is your money, not ours. You have full control.

methodology.question: Why is your verification method better?
methodology.answer: We use Knowledge Graph structure (relationship-based), not alphabetical order. Spaced repetition verification (Day 3, 7, 14) ensures long-term recognition, not short-term memory. 99.54% confidence, not 25% guessing rate.

gap.question: Why stay ahead of official numbers?
gap.answer: Official numbers say senior high needs 4,000-5,000 words, but reality expects 8,000+. Meeting only official numbers = actually behind. We help you verify if your child is truly ahead, ready to face real expectations.

section5.intro: You can opt-out of receiving emails from us at any time by:
section5.method1: Clicking the "Unsubscribe" link at the bottom of any email we send you
section5.method2: Contacting us directly at the email address provided below
section5.note: Once you unsubscribe, you will no longer receive updates about our beta launch, but your email will remain in our system for record-keeping purposes unless you request deletion.

section6.title: 6. Children's Privacy
section6.content: This waitlist is for parents only. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 20 (Taiwan's age of majority). When our platform launches, we will implement appropriate parental consent mechanisms in compliance with Taiwan's Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA).
